main event: A civilian reported a sighting of an oval object changing colors from red, white to blue over Baltimore on 16 June 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as stationary and flickering,The sighting lasted for about 3-5 minutes,The object moved in an irregular course and disappeared abruptly, Multiple sources indicated the object could be a balloon or aircraft, The characteristics of the object were noted to point towards it likely being a balloon.
